destinations.name: Ilam Tea Gardens
destinations.description: Explore the lush green tea gardens that have made Ilam famous worldwide. Visit tea factories, learn about tea processing, and enjoy fresh tea tasting sessions.

destinations.name: Mai Pokhari
destinations.description: A sacred lake surrounded by dense forests, Mai Pokhari is a perfect spot for nature lovers and spiritual seekers. The area is rich in biodiversity and offers stunning views.

destinations.name: Kanyam
destinations.description: Known for its beautiful tea gardens and pleasant climate, Kanyam is a popular tourist destination. Enjoy the scenic views and visit the local tea processing center.

destinations.name: Chhintapu
destinations.description: A beautiful viewpoint offering panoramic views of the Himalayas and surrounding hills. Perfect for sunrise and sunset views.

destinations.name: Antudanda
destinations.description: A hill station offering breathtaking views of the Himalayas and surrounding valleys. Popular for trekking and nature walks.

destinations.name: Shree Antu
destinations.description: Famous for its sunrise views over Mount Kanchenjunga, Shree Antu is a must-visit destination for nature lovers and photographers.
